title: Understanding Accounting Through Communication and Interpretation: Civic Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Accounting Terminology and Financial Management Experience in Daily Life
context.additional_context: Program designed to enable learners to apply accounting concepts in everyday situations through smartphone-based microlearning, with enhanced case analysis and discussion via hermeneutic approaches

learning_goals: Learners can interpret and explain everyday financial scenarios from an accounting perspective
Learners enhance their ability to explore multiple accounting interpretations through peer communication
Learners participate in decision-making simulations using simple budget planning and analysis tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
